description.p: Support package for the KUKA KR1000_TITAN (and variants), based on ROS-Industrial support packages.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA KR1000_TITAN manipulators. This currently includes the base model.

Joint limits and max joint velocities are based on the information in the KUKA data sheets. All URDFs / XACROs are based on the default motion , unless noted otherwise (ie: no support for high speed joints, extended / limited motion ranges or other options).
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
